com.thomasdiewald.liquidfun.java.interaction

Interface DwInteractionEvent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DwMouseDragBodies, DwMouseDragParticles, DwMouseShootBullet, DwParticleDestroyer, DwParticleSpawn

    public interface DwInteractionEvent
    Interface for mouse interactions, mainly used by DwWorld to have some default interaction handlers.
    Author:
    Thomas Diewald
